subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Penguins center Jordan Staal appeared much older than his years last season, when as an 18-year-old he became the youngest player in N.H.L. history to score three goals in a game.
snippet: Pittsburgh Penguins center Jordan Staal appeared much older than his years last season, when as an 18-year-old he became the youngest player in N.H.L. history to score three goals in a game.
